thread.title: If You’re a Purist About Scotch Whisky, You Might Find This Hard to Swallow

author: Saabira Chaudhuri
title: If You’re a Purist About Scotch Whisky, You Might Find This Hard to Swallow
text:
LONDON—Here’s a neat story.
The documents involved are top secret. They detail a plot by a multinational company to challenge hundreds of years of tradition. Some find the suggestions so hard to swallow they are warning of rebellion.
The making of Scotch whisky has long followed a precise formula enshrined in law and precedent. Scotch must...
